statement.p: Out of the last 48 days, it rained 18 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{18}}{{48}}={0.375}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.375}={37.5} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 37.5 .
